review_data.title: A good place to lounge and work
review_data.content: I came here twice during my stay as I found it a good place to have a nice coffee/wine in between my meetings. It has a nice ambience, busy but could still be private, and the staff were very accommodating.

review_data.title: Guter Espresso und Espresso macchiato
review_data.content: Schönes Café in der Innenstadt, guter Espresso und Espresso macchiato mit kleinem Glas Wasser, Service nicht besonders freundlich aber ok.

review_data.title: Great cappucino!
review_data.content: Nice café conveniently located right outside Jelmoli on Bahnhofstraße. It's a quiet nook with warm service and great cappucino!

review_data.title: Für einen Drink

review_data.title: Bester Cappuccino in Zürich
review_data.content: Das Bovelli liegt ideal Nähe Bahnhofstrasse, ein paar Gehminuten vom HB entfernt. Es ist hübsch, das Personal sehr freundlich, auch...More

review_data.title: Sehr cooler Aperitivo
review_data.content: Moderne, stylische Bar mit nettem Personal und kleiner aber feiner Cocktailkarte. Die erste Runde Campari Sprizz ging auf's Haus. Dazu...More

review_data.title: Кофе
review_data.content: Вроде как очень хороший тут кофе, что бывает не часто. Вкусный был лимонад и вообще приятное местои расположение хорошее.

review_data.title: This is a fantastic bar and cafe
review_data.content: If in Zurich, we go to Bovelli. Excellent staff. Excellent bar and the coffee is a saviour. The Baristas are also fantastic and approachable. Very helpful. The South African guy with the curly hair is very good.

review_data.title: Top Cocktail
review_data.content: Stylische Bar mit nettem Personal und super Cocktails. Diese werden professionell zubereitet. Es gibt genug Plätze und man findet meistens...More

review_data.title: Verbrühter Espressso, arroganter Service
review_data.content: Leider wieder eine schlechte Erfahrung in einem Caffe in Zürich. Schmuddelig, die Tische und Bänke nicht sauber, der Service sehr...More

review_data.title: Zu wenig Personal, viel zu lange Wartezeiten
review_data.content: Am Kaffee gibt's nichts auszusetzen, auch die übrigen Getränke sind einwandfrei. Das Problem - wie so häufig in Zürich -...More

review_data.title: a place 2 b
review_data.content: Stammlokal-Qualitäten - viele Drinks, guter Kaffee, kleine Naschereien, schönes Personal, mitten im Kuchen...

review_data.title: Arrogantes Personal
review_data.content: Eigentlich ein sehr stylisches Cafe mit hervorragendem Kaffee. Aber leider mit äußerst arroganter Bedienung (zumindest die, die wir hatten) Schade!

review_data.title: Coffee-Culture
review_data.content: Verschiedene ausgezeichnete Kaffee-Kreationen in top Qualität. Sehr freundliches und kompetentes Personal. Absolutes Muss bei einem Zürich-Besuch!

review_data.title: Great coffee & pastries - long waiting times
review_data.content: Belongs to the top 5 coffee places in the center of Zurich!!! Don't make the mistake to sit down and wait for staff to come, that might take them up to 20mins.... Go to the bar and get the attention of one of the servers...More

review_data.title: Drinks at Bovelli
review_data.content: Great place for an apero or coffee after shopping at bahnhofstrasse. We had the negroni sbagliato - excellent!

review_data.title: Top coffee
review_data.content: One of the best places in zurich for coffee Great blends of speciallity espresso and good quality of classic coffee

review_data.title: Excellent for a drink or coffee
review_data.content: A quiet, but not boring, place to chat. Good coffee, good service and convenient location near hotel Seidenhoff.

review_data.title: Very good coffee

review_data.title: Angenehme Atmosphäre, grosse Zeitschriftenauswahl
review_data.content: Ideal für den Stopp zwischendurch - oder das Auftankenin düsteren Zeiten: gemischtes Publikum, freundliche Bedienung, Steckdose, saubere Toiletten. Du kannst...More

review_data.title: Cafe culture almost.
review_data.content: A very stylish looking bar area and most of the seating is comfortable. The coffee has been consistently good and the sandwiches aren't bad. My only complaint is the music is quite loud for an afternoon coffee stop. I can see after work, but during...More

review_data.title: Nette Leute und gute Getränke

review_data.title: Nettes Café

review_data.title: Aperitivo ideale in centro Zurigo.
review_data.content: Mi sono recato qui per un aperitivo con un amico, ho trovato il servizio celere e non invadente. Il luogo...More

review_data.title: Coffee ok, poor service
review_data.content: Centrally located, coffee ok, ambiance relatively ok: according to my opinion the white undecorated walls add no character and the service 👎: order did not come even though we reminded the waiter about it 2 more times...to his frustration!

review_data.title: Best coffe in Zurich!
review_data.content: By far the best coffee (real coffee) in Zurich. It is as close as you will get to true Italian coffee in Zurich.

review_data.title: Poor service
review_data.content: The place looks good, rather stylish, and is conveniently located for an after work drink in the city centre. The staff was unfortunately poorly organised and we never got the drinks we ordered. A waiter came to ask if we'd like "anything else" after a...More

review_data.title: Cappuccino
review_data.content: Super toller Cappuccino - sehr nette Atmosphäre - cooler Service. Komme ganz bestimmt wieder zurück!

review_data.title: Helle Röstung - Great Coffee

review_data.title: Auf einen Gin!
review_data.content: War mit meiner Freundin am Wochenende per Zufall im Bovelli gelandet! Nettes Ambiente und eine gute Gin und Tonicauswahl stellten...More

review_data.title: Приятное местечко с демократичными ценами.
review_data.content: Побывала в этом кафе между посещениями магазинов. Перекусила салатиками и приятно посидела с чашечкой кофе на уличной террасе, наблюдая будничную...More

review_data.title: Cool bar for drinks and cocktails
review_data.content: I made a quick stop in at Bovelli for a hot morning beverage. When I am in the mood for hot chocolate, I always have to ask the staff if they offer hot chocolate and if they have soy milk, as I have been surprised...More

review_data.title: Endlich ausgezeichneten Kaffee im Zentrum der Stadt!
review_data.content: Seit Jahren bin ich geschäftlich in Zürich unterwegs und musste mich lang gedulden, bis ich auf das neu eröffnete Bovelli...More

review_data.title: Best Coffee In Town - & Cocktails!
review_data.content: W a h r h a f t i g guter Kaffee. Vor allem die Röstung 'Don Oscar' zu empfehlen:...More

review_data.title: Amazing coffee, chilled prosecco and handsome baristas/barkeepers
review_data.content: Once I`m in Zurich I make sure to drop in at Bovelli. The venue (bright and spacious) is in the urban core, right next to the famous vegetarian restaurant Hiltl. Their coffee (they offer a variety of beans!) is always exquisite and you get a...More

review_data.title: very classy, modern cocktail and coffeebar
review_data.content: i had one of the finest espressos here at bovelli. a young crew of friendly and lovely bartenders and baristas. the second time i dropped by for some well prepared and beautiful cocktails. i recommend everybody to visit bovelli. two thumbs up!

review_data.title: Goodbye beste Espressobar nördlich der Alpen
review_data.content: Früher hiess die Bar Infinito und hat über ein Jahrzehnt lang den besten Espresso in Zürich geboten; es konnte mehrere...More

review_data.title: ..and the 5 goes to - BOVELLI!
review_data.content: A place of class, coolness, talented Baritas and elegant espresso. It has Italianità, it’s own unique city style, and takes Zürich’s centre stage with no hesitation. Espresso rating: 5.0 out of 5 I still remember the first time our lips touched – the Bovelli espresso...More

review_data.title: No food choice and bad service
